About Us

AddVentures is building the global marketplace of the FinTech world. At one end of the value chain are the banks, their SMEs and their consumers. At the other end are the FinTechs. The FinTech connects once to Addventures.io gaining access to the banks on our marketplace and their customers.

AddVentures simplifies the consumption of diverse, digital-era businesses

We enable access to the next generation of services provided by a unique world-wide portfolio of vetted and quality-assured FinTechs.

We achieve this through the provision of a global market-place which provides standardised access to established market owners, their consumers and their business customers.

Part of the
PayX Group

Addventures is part of the PayX Group. Established in 1996, PayX is a well known specialist global Payments Market Analyst, Consultancy and Nextgen (FinTech) portfolio firm. We are now the trusted advisor to many of the world’s leading payment organisations where we utilise our knowledge and experience to extend their success.

PayX has over 250 consultants globally, is informed and pragmatic which enables it to assist its customers to deliver around 360° from concept through to implementation.
